sentences.en: "Let's invite her to dinner." — "Over my dead body!"
sentences.cn: “我们请她来吃晚饭吧。”——“除非我死了！”

sentences.en: A cool shower wakes up the body and boosts circulation.
sentences.cn: 冷水澡可以刺激身体，促进血液循环。

sentences.en: A dog found the body of a girl in the woods.
sentences.cn: 一条狗在树林里发现了一具女孩的尸体。

sentences.en: an operation to remove a foreign body (= sth that would not usually be there) from a wound
sentences.cn: 从伤口摘除异物的手术

sentences.en: do you think a man can keep body and soul together by selling coconuts?.
sentences.cn: 你以为靠卖椰子就能活命？。

sentences.en: Exercising the body does a great deal to improve one's health.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体对增进健康大有益处。

sentences.en: He ignores the traditional Christian dualism between body and soul.
sentences.cn: 他无视传统基督教的肉体与灵魂的二元论。

sentences.en: He needs to overcome a negative body image (=  what you think about your own body  ) .
sentences.cn: 他需要克服对自己身体的负面印象。

sentences.en: heavenly bodies (= stars, planets, etc.)
sentences.cn: 天体（恒星、行星等）

sentences.en: Her whole body began to buckle, unbalancing the ladder.
sentences.cn: 她整个身体开始弯曲，搞得梯子倾侧起来。

sentences.en: Ignoring feelings of tiredness knocks our body clocks out of kilter.
sentences.cn: 忽视疲劳感会打乱我们的生物钟。

sentences.en: It is probably the most polluted body of water in the world.
sentences.cn: 这很可能是世界上受污染最严重的一片水域。

sentences.en: Keep the caps on the bottles to prevent foreign bodies entering them (= objects that should not be there )
sentences.cn: 瓶子要盖好，以免异物进入。

sentences.en: My fingers were numb and my whole body ached.
sentences.cn: 我手指麻木，浑身疼痛。

sentences.en: Pain is the body's way of telling us that something is wrong.
sentences.cn: 疼痛是身体在告诉我们有地方出问题了。

sentences.en: Relax, smile; loosen up in mind and body and behaviour.
sentences.cn: 放松，微笑。精神、身体和行为上都要放轻松。

sentences.en: she moves into our home over my dead body.
sentences.cn: 她不顾我极力反对搬到我们家来。

sentences.en: She swathed her enormous body in thin black fabrics.
sentences.cn: 她用薄薄的黑色织物裹住了自己硕大的身躯。

sentences.en: The body is made up primarily of bone, muscle, and fat.
sentences.cn: 人体主要是由骨骼、肌肉和脂肪构成。

sentences.en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentences.cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentences.en: the company owned them body and soul.
sentences.cn: 他们完全属于这家公司。

sentences.en: the human body
sentences.cn: 人体

sentences.en: the main body of the text
sentences.cn: 课文的正文

sentences.en: The news from Body Shop rattled the rest of the retail sector.
sentences.cn: 从“美体小铺”传来的消息令整个零售行业不安。

sentences.en: they departed in a body.
sentences.cn: 他们一起离开了。

sentences.en: To see my body literally wither away before my eyes was exasperating.
sentences.cn: 眼见自己的身体日渐衰弱真是让人心烦。

sentences.en: Xandra is an athletic 36-year-old with a 21-year-old's body.
sentences.cn: 36岁的汉德拉身体健壮，有着21岁小伙子的体能。

words.tran_cn: 整体地；亲自地；以肉体形式
赋…以形体；体现（body的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 身体质量指数；体质指数；体质指数
主体，主要部分；主船体；机身
(非正式)［表示强调］在自己拼死反对某事的情况下

trans.tran_cn: 身体，躯干，尸体，物体，主要部分，团体，机构，大量，浓密，香醇，女式紧身衣
trans.tran_en: the physical structure of a person or animal
the physical structure of a person or animal
